ActCanada Transportation Act
PrecisAppointment of SCOTT HUGH STREINER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a member of the Canadian Transportation Agency to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of SCOTT HUGH STREINER as Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Agency, effective July 20, 2015.
